repo_notes.content: dcyfr-ai is the public AI agent framework package (@dcyfr/ai on npm). Provides core abstractions for building AI agents with MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration, LLM provider support, and agent lifecycle management. Published as open-source MIT licensed package.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Architecture: packages/ai/ contains core framework with agents/, agents-builtin/ (15 generic agents), llm/ (LLM providers), mcp/ (Model Context Protocol servers), runtime/ (agent execution). Designed for extensibility through plugin system and agent manifests.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Priority documentation: packages/ai/agents/ (agent abstractions, loader, manifest schema), packages/ai/agents-builtin/ (15 built-in agents like cli-expert, security-engineer, test-engineer), packages/ai/llm/ (OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama providers), packages/ai/mcp/ (MCP server implementations), packages/ai/runtime/ (agent execution engine).
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent

repo_notes.content: Key patterns: Agent manifests define capabilities/permissions/tools (YAML frontmatter + markdown body), MCP servers provide tool context, LLM providers abstract API differences, runtime orchestrates agent execution with memory/delegation support. See docs/architecture/ for ADRs.
repo_notes.author: DCYFR Workspace Agent
